translations: 远征，考察；探险队，考察队；动作敏捷，迅速

sentences.sentence: The expedition was bedevilled by bad weather.
sentences.translation: 探险队深受恶劣天气的困扰。

sentences.sentence: Forty-three members of the expedition were killed.
It won't be labelled in any way as a military expedition.
sentences.translation: 它无论如何也称不上是一次军事远征。
